website_summaries.verdict: Single burner propane grill is small and perfect for camping.
pros: Comes with a removable grease tray for easy cleanup
Grills for 2 hours with one 16.4 oz
cons: Customers comment that the wind blockers do a poor job of protecting against the elements

customer_reviews.title: ... this grill (10+ years old) and it was a fantastic grill. After years of service the grill finally ...
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned this grill (10+ years old) and it was a fantastic grill. After years of service the grill finally died. I bought the same model replacement with high hopes. This quality of this product is awful at best. Compared to the original it is constructed of thinner cheaper metal and the grill surface e is aluminium and warped the first time it was used. The. Burner does not fire evenly and the bottle connector leaks requiring Teflon tape to make a seal. I have already filed for return and hope that you do not make the same mistake. Coleman had a customer that was loyal to the product. They lost this customer.
customer_reviews.author: John Savarese

customer_reviews.title: worse product ever!
customer_reviews.text: this is the worse product made by coleman! I was very surprised as we've owned other items made by them! its says perfect even heat "NOT". it says great wind blocker 'NOT". cant get even cooked meals, the wind blows out flames, you cant adjust heat source! the list goes on and on... I dont recommend this product to anyone.....
customer_reviews.author: PA Armitstead

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Hassel
customer_reviews.text: Bought the grill for camping. Used it once to make burgers thinking that it would be an easy cleanup, as my other Coleman grills are. Not the case. To clean it properly, I had to take out multiple screws a basically disassemble the grill. Even after doing all that, it didn't clean up very well. By looking at it you would think that I've used it for years, but it isn't the case. Not worth the money or the hassle to clean it. Had I not burned the box in the campfire, I would've returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Burns all food.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Burns everything instantly even on the lowest heat. Cooking grid warped on first use. Sent it back. Got Weber Q series instead. Much pricier, but well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: G Q.

customer_reviews.title: Scratches, major hole
customer_reviews.text: The order of this item was a major disappoint. Not only was the grill greasy in a few spots, it had a major hole and scratches covering many surfaces. It does not appear to be used, as everything was still in original packaging. Request a refund and am too put off on ordering a new one. Major disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: A good grill, BUT!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well, but is relatively fragile. As long as one is aware of the fact that it is made of light weight metal and handles it accordingly, it should be ok. I bought the carrying case for mine and had it standing handles up in the case. It tipped over on its feet side in its case, and the next time I used it, I had to get the dent out by one of it's feet so it would sit level. As long as you are aware of this, and are careful with it, the grill itself works fine, and is still probably a good value.
customer_reviews.author: EPVC

customer_reviews.title: Nice Basic Grill for the Money
customer_reviews.text: We use this grill when camping and on our boat. It's a nice basic grill that grills up hot dogs and hamburgers very well. I wouldn't use it for complicated or long grilling items, that's not what it's designed for. It's a nice basic lightweight grill. The only negative is it does not grill well under windy conditions, it simply is too affected by the wind, such that it doesn't get hot enough to effectively grill in windy conditions, this is why I gave it 4 stars, not 5.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.text: Looks nice on my boat! Almost a full season in and I'm a little disappointed. The lid does not want to stay up when I'm grilling....even after locking in the sides! They lock in...but they don't lock in! Kind of discouraging when your trying to grill and they lid and sides keep falling down! Looking for another grill to try :(
customer_reviews.author: William Karcher

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk.  Warps from normal cooking
customer_reviews.text: What a horrific piece of junk. We used it exactly one time and the cooking surface is warped by an inch. The knob is so loose it hard to tell what setting its on or if its even on or off. The top even isnt straight and will barely hold it self open while cooking. See my video. When I was a kid, Coleman was a quality product. Now its junk imported from China with their name stuck on it. Avoid this product and probably all the rest too.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Some flaws but overall a decent camp grill
customer_reviews.text: A decent little camp grill. Originally arrived with the front left corner sticking out a bit, making the lid catch and get stuck closed. I was able to correct that by popping it back in to the frame. What I can't fix however is that the grill plate has warped pretty significantly after only 3 uses. It will still function but I'm going to contact their customer service and see about a replacement since I would typically expect better quality from a brand like Coleman.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay lit with any breeze
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use this on our boat this past weekend, but we never even got the chance. Darn thing wouldn’t stay lit. The lid doesn’t close while cooking and there’s no way to keep the flame from being blown out in a normal breeze. Pretty disappointed since this was a Christmas present we were really looking forward to grilling on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to grill up some burgers at the beach. Was very disappointed. The drip tray they give you in very shallow. Which overflowed with the grease of 2 burgers, which ended up catching fire burning a hole in my table. The grill is made of cheap aluminum and warped with one use.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria de La cruz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Easy to put together and operate . But , doing my first grill , one of the hinge come off. Look like both hinge rivets are not strong enough to hold the top cover .
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Grill melts
customer_reviews.text: The grill is made of aluminum and warped the first, and only time, I heated water on it. Others have said the grill MELTED while boiling water. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Patti C

customer_reviews.title: Great for a boat!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my father in law for his boat (purchased brackets separately). He was very happy with it and finds it to be a great size for their party boat! No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Jae.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Not the Coleman quality you’d be expecting. Metal is super flimsy and the weld on the lid broke the first use. Feels like it may as well be a children’s toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for tailgating or camping
customer_reviews.text: Bought to take camping. It works well, but the rivets holding the hinges on broke on one side. Rivets and hinges need to be larger and sturdier. Otherwise, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: The Good Wife

customer_reviews.title: Cure it first start cooking
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill. No need for extra frying pans taking up room Really this grill could be all one needs. And a one burner for coffee but could even use the grill for that too!
customer_reviews.author: Diambel

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: It worked ok for 2 camping trips. Not great but ok. Definitely not gonna wear a steak on this thing and it has poor heat intensity I’m many spots but it eventually cooked the food. My biggest issue was that it stopped working, unfortunately the gas will no longer come out. I tested the unit with new gas, verified that the valve was working and when the gas is on the plunger in the valve works correctly. But aomehow the gas will not go past the connected valve into the grill vents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camp stove
customer_reviews.text: Standard propane camping cook stove, but this one has a much slimmer profile than our last one, making it even more portable than before. We don't do a lot of cooking while camping, but this certainly took care of what we needed. You can fit two pots/pans on this stove comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Ashworth

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful grill that we take to the lake every week. Easy to get going and the wind protection sides helps keep it lit. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Camping!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this since last July. It’s perfect for camping. Super easy to use and lightweight. It cleans up well too. The sides come up to prevent the wind from creating uneven cooking. We’re excited to bring this to Colorado for a camping trip this August.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Webb

customer_reviews.title: Used Grill One Time And Grate Bent out of Shape
customer_reviews.text: I used this grill one time and the grate is now bent out of shape. There is no option to contact the seller, so i hope to get a response from this review. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: DLev

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Can hold a 8 to 10 in frying ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Can hold a 8 to 10 in frying pan. The intense heat warped the grill on the first time . Remember to use a no stick spray on grill.
customer_reviews.author: Rawrooster71

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all. Very disappointed with this grill
customer_reviews.author: Aleta

customer_reviews.title: Great portable grill
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase good for road trips fishing and camping I always have it in my truck
customer_reviews.author: raymond gudaitis

customer_reviews.title: I bought this grill to replace the existing grill I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grill to replace the existing grill I use when camping. They really made this new grill extremely cheep This was to be an exact replacement but it is very light duty not the way they made them 10 yrs ago😩😝
customer_reviews.author: Ron stock

customer_reviews.title: Was nice and big
customer_reviews.text: Was nice and big. worked like a charm. the only thing I didn't like is that you couldn't close the lid when cooking because the lid is too thin. You can tell this is made very well.
customer_reviews.author: darklord752

customer_reviews.title: Camping Grill
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, but not light weight. Not flimsy either. Weight adds up when going camping.
customer_reviews.author: Neila

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The grate warped after the second use, so very disappointed in the quality of this.
customer_reviews.author: lemarie54703

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one I have purchased. It works very well for a table top unit.
customer_reviews.author: Rancher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the boat
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for out on our pontoon, and it is the perfect size. It heats evenly and does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Angie R

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!!
customer_reviews.text: Makes eating on the boat so much better!! Love the pop up sides.....no worries about hotdogs rolling off!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smith Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Great little grill.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grill for our boat worked like a charm. I fit about 4 large burger patties and a few hot dogs. Cooked it all great and quick.
customer_reviews.author: derik hirshberg

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy junk
customer_reviews.text: Worst grill ever. can’t regulate the heat it’s either hot or hotter. the greats already warped. Only used three times and it’s going in the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Propane Regulator Problems
customer_reviews.text: Something is broken inside the propane regulator and i have to stand there and hold the turn knob down while food is cooking otherwise the propane shuts off. Very annoying to find this out the first time i used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware, Grill Grate Will Warp!
customer_reviews.text: I own almost the exact same grill and love it so wanted to get one as a gift for my mom. Only it appears the grill grates on this one are not the same as on the one I own. Mine are heavy duty cast iron and great! This one the grates warped so horribly after one use they no longer sit on the grill! Terribly disappointed! Sending back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Alie K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great little stove, very efficient and equal heating over the burner, bought one for my kids
customer_reviews.author: rusl21

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with a big dent in it. Still usable but not very happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: JKent64

customer_reviews.title: Grill warped on two different units.  Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Grill warped after two uses again. Returning and buying a different product. Don't waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: AZhappy

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for...
customer_reviews.text: First review, so bear with me.. I was extremely disappointed in the quality of this grill.. I had honestly expected more from Coleman. You can't close the lid while it's on because of these stupid side pieces. Second, those stupid side pieces are the only thing that hold the lid up.. If you let the lid go by accident, it will fall all the way backwards, and break the hinge as it did for me.. Because you can't close the lid, things take FOREVER to cook.. Oh and the best part? The actual grill top.. has warped... after like 4 uses... it's like curling up on the corners...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: great grill space
customer_reviews.text: great grill. wish it had an adaptor for the propane tank
customer_reviews.author: Frances L Whalen

customer_reviews.title: This has been the best grill for the money
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best grill for the money. Easy set up. Easy to clean. I use it every other weekend for tailgating and its size is perfect to fit in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Shark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Coleman still has the same great quality I remember as a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The first time I opened the stove the cover fell off I had to re-rivet the hinges back on
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Lanouette

customer_reviews.title: Dented Lid
customer_reviews.text: Paid $85 and came with a dent in the lid.....
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for the pontoon. Mounted perfect with the brackets I bought (Arnalls grill bracket set).
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great grill. I'm a truck driver and its easy to use and doesn't take up a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: The grill itself looks nice but haven't been able to use
customer_reviews.text: The regulator does not screw on to the small gas bottle. Trying to figure out how to get this problem solved! The grill itself looks nice but haven't been able to use!
customer_reviews.author: GChapman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Use it regularly and works great. Arrived just as described and is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Larry P. Rigney Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Ready to go!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to mount on our pontoon boat. It's easy to grill and clean up. You really can't go wrong with Coleman!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for camping. I put foil on bottom for easier clean up
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cook evenly
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this grill doesn't cook evenly. The seller was great and gave a good price. I just wasn't very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: lesjack

customer_reviews.title: Best looking and working portable grill we have ever used and seen!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this for me for fathers day and we bring it everywhere we go! No kidding this thing is so sleek we can fire it up and eat anything practically anywhere a must have for the grilling enthusiast!
customer_reviews.author: IT Specialist

customer_reviews.title: This is a great grill, cooks anything
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill, cooks anything, you can even put a pot or pan on it, i got a grill that fits. love it
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: This grill, upon first use, is horrible. I plAn to contact Amazon soon to complain. The grate warped after first use and the cooking temps are too high. Grill was still too hot on lowest setting. Not what I expected from Coleman!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Harn

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: Got this grill the other day and put it right to work, very easy to clean when you put aluminum foil in the bottom under the burner. Got a 6 pack of gas bottle from Sams for 16 dollars should last all summer.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: Great for couples
customer_reviews.text: Bought if for my dad for father's day. He loves, apparently.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for beach/travel
customer_reviews.text: Very portable grill for the beach or while traveling. It is easy to use and easy to clean. Best used for smaller meals.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: A keeper :( :)
customer_reviews.text: I like this item, it's light, decent quality, very portable and has a nice setup for cooking, easy to open and operate. The tempature control was broken tho, I only have low range, it gives off plenty of heat on low so i wont ship it back. A very good value if in 100% working condition, I still reccomend this item tho.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Good Design and Practicality
customer_reviews.text: Overall - a good design and very practical for camping trips. Difficult to clean, however, and I would make sure you clean it after use. The grease-catching tray does not stay on well and frequently falls off - needs to fit tighter. Over-all though, a good proudct.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie R. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because our camper came with a version that has the stove burner/BBQ and we never used the burner. The catch was, the camper has a built in compartment for this gril or the one with the burner. After the first use, I noticed the grate was warped when it cooled down. The next time I used it, the grate settled back into position, but when it cooled it again was warped. I like the extra cooking surface. But the warping bothers me a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to set up and very portable. We ate good...lol enjoyed camping and reconnecting with my teenagers.
customer_reviews.author: teandeanwhinchester

customer_reviews.title: The hubs loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this little grill for at home use. My husband was dying to grill a steak or two but we just don't have the room on our patios. Now, he can pull this out of the garage, grill dinner and pack it back up! Genius!
customer_reviews.author: Kenya Reeves Costa

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase ever, whole cooking surface bent the first time I used it, wish I could return it!!!very disappointed, blah
customer_reviews.author: corey gripp

customer_reviews.title: Small and super effecient
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this grill is how good it will cook even in high winds. We use it at the beach a lot where there is usually always a breeze and this thing is perfect there. The only downside is that the griddle gets so hot you do tend to get a fair amount of food sticking to it.
customer_reviews.author: IMAD!man

customer_reviews.title: Sending it back!
customer_reviews.text: The overall construction is a bit flimsy. The cover came with a small dent in it, and I could see the metal would dent really easily. The grill surface itself is just pressed steel with a thin ceramic coating. Upon assembling the grill I fired it up to test the unit out. On the lowest setting the grill surface started to warp! I made my decision at that point not to use it and return it. Coleman makes a few better units than this. The one that is a grill / stove at least has a cast aluminum grill that seems much more sturdy than this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sorce

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Received the grill quickly and after assembly it seemed to work fine. I purchased this for our pontoon boat and on the first trip out I opened the lid and the rivets on one hinge ripped out. I replaced the rivets on the next trip but the grease tray does not securely snap into place and came off at some point and is now lost. As far as cooking the grill works great for the price point but I wish I would've spent a little more for a better quality unit
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Car Camping Necessity
customer_reviews.text: We are totally late to the game and have been using our backpacking stove as we car camp with our 2 kids. Now that we have the Coleman Camp stove, our meals are so much better and more gourmet! If you car camp at all, this is worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Rim

customer_reviews.title: Emergency Home Cookie
customer_reviews.text: Last year we lost power for 4 days. With no home cooking and no way to make coffee just made a bad situtation worse. So we bought this both for travel and those power outage emergencies
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Good Grill for the boat
customer_reviews.text: This grill has worked well for us so far, only used it 2-3 times but has been fun. My only complaint and why I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is that the flame gets blown out fairly easily so you have to keep a close eye on it so your propane is not running without the flame. Also, the bracket set was a chore to get attached to the grill. Otherwise it has worked well and we are enjoying it! I would recommend it to anyone with a pontoon boat which is what we use ours on.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Renee

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: Really like the grill and works great. However, if you have a little bit of breeze, it doesn't heat up fast or hardly at all. Really great for camping and great for boating too, but like I said, it can't be breezy at all.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for camping and it works great!! We buy the canisters of propane @ Walmart for less than 5 bucks and it cleans up easy! Storage is a breeze as well, since it's so slim and lightweight! Recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Just like other reviews it warped during the first use and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just like other reviews it warped during the first use and got worse with use 2 and 3. We returned it
customer_reviews.author: Djy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money!!
customer_reviews.text: Completely disappointed in this product! I bought it for my boyfriend to use on his lunch breaks. We tried it out in the garage and even the lowest setting was so hot, it just burns your food! The grate is so warped after just 3 uses, that he can't even use it! We hadn't used it right away after purchasing, so I can't return to Amazon...and there is no link or info to find out how to get a return. Don't waste your time or money with this product! I would have given this product zero stars if it let me.
customer_reviews.author: Cristol Lavallee

customer_reviews.title: Great for griddle cooking.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a backup in case my favorite campground in Idaho had a fire ban on. However, I decided to use it with my griddle the first time I took it there. It is great. Nice even heat and the griddle's small legs fit into the grooves so it does not slide around. I used it every morning for pancakes and cooking bacon. Way better than using a camp stove and a griddle combination. I highly recommed it to anyone. If you are going to use it as a BBQ then take along a good cleaner to clean underneath its grills.
customer_reviews.author: BLC

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my old one!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item on Amazon because it's the only place that I could find this Coleman grill. I had one that broke while on vacation and wanted to get another one - since we had a good experience with it. I'm shocked that Coleman would make such an inferior product. If you've had one before, the new one is not that great. This is the first time I've ever written a bad review, but felt that I should warn others. This product doesn't live up to the Coleman standards, and they should be embarrassed for selling such an inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Millman

customer_reviews.title: Grill gets too hot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my hotdog cart. I liked the idea of the wind guards. But the grill gets too hot, even on the lowest setting it still burns my hotdogs, brats, and sausages. The heat is not even so I try to find a spot that is not as hot and stack the food to one corner to try to slow down the cooking. I like the size, wish it had a handle for carrying. I would like it if I could control the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: So far this is just what we wanted and is working great. Time will tell as we won't be grilling until next spring/summer.
customer_reviews.author: J. G.

customer_reviews.title: Catch of the day
customer_reviews.text: Hope it works as great as it looks like it will so we can cook the catch of the day. We will find out come summer time. This was a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Good option for a pontoon boat.
customer_reviews.text: We mounted this on our 2007 PartyBarge 25 using the Grill Mount Brackets from Extreme Marine. This is a much cheaper option than buying a marine grill from the big box marine stores. I removed the propane bottle and used "grill repair parts" available at Walmart to run a new propane gas line to a 20 lb. propane bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vennekotter

customer_reviews.title: Coleman
customer_reviews.text: Dented real easy. Unlike my 20 year old Coleman that is bullet proof. Things are made Cheap these days
customer_reviews.author: D M

customer_reviews.title: Grill works
customer_reviews.text: It works ok had to drill holes to make the rack fit to the boat rails, when used a second time the gas line from bottle to grill stopped working, just ordered an new one from Coleman.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lemont

customer_reviews.title: Grille warped.
customer_reviews.text: The cooking grille warrped after two uses. It is just a piece od stamped steel. The heat settings are either too hot or off. The setup is time consuming and haphazard. Would not recomend this unit at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't what I expected sorry made to cheep for me .
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this yet but plan to in two weeks. It seems up to the usual Coleman quality - very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great grill, very satisfied. Add one to your camping supplies
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: It was not a good choice
customer_reviews.text: The grill looks good but it didn't help. It is too low, be sure to use it in a place not too windy because it turn off every time. I wish I could return it because I couldn't use it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mirella

customer_reviews.title: Great grill very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great item I ordered this just a few days before a recent hurricane and to my surprise it got here in time. Product works great. Ups drivers are great too
customer_reviews.author: christine da cruz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little grill for the boat. Easy to clean and cooks the hamburgers and hot dogs great.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wallace

product_meta.title: Coleman Camp Propane Grill
product_meta.description: Enjoy easy outdoor grilling at the campsite or tailgate party with the Coleman Camp Propane Grill. With a heat intensity of 11,000 BTUs, this durable, steel-crafted grill gives you the cooking power to prepare a wide range of foods. PerfectFlow technology helps keep the heat steady even in extreme conditions, while PerfectHeat technology allows for more fuel-efficient cooking. WindBlock panels help shield your flame from the wind and fold down for use as side tables on calm days. With its 180-square-inch cooktop, this portable BBQ grill offers a large cooking surface area that is perfect for grilling meals for families or groups. And thanks to its porcelain-coated surface and removable grease tray, this propane grill is easy to clean. The Coleman Camp Propane Grill lasts up to 2 hours on high with one 16.4-ounce propane cylinder (sold separately).
feature_bullets: Versatile outdoor grill ideal for camping, hunting, and tailgating
Delivers 11,000 btus of heat across 180 sqaure inch of grilling surface
Wind block panels shield burners from wind and fold down for use as side tables
Perfect heat technology ensures efficient cooking using less fuel
Perfect flow technology provides consistent performance even in extreme conditions
